item.name: Spiked Armor
item.text:
Spiked armor is a rare type of medium armor made by dwarves. It consists of a leather coat and leggings covered with spikes that are usually made of metal.
The wearer has disadvantage on Stealth (Dexterity) checks.
Source: Sword Coast Adventurer's Guide p. 121

item.name: Spiked Barding
item.text:
Spiked armor is a rare type of medium armor made by dwarves. It consists of a leather coat and leggings covered with spikes that are usually made of metal.
Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body.
Spiked barding provides a mount with an AC equal to 14 + the mount's Dexterity modifier (max 2). The mount makes Dexterity (Stealth) checks with disadvantage.
Source: Player's Handbook (2014) p. 157, Sword Coast Adventurer's Guide p. 121
